txt.en: 'I am here to help. What can I do for you?'
'I volunteered to work here at Wistmead during the Harvest Festival.'
'Having a good, spooky time? I hope so!'
'There is a lot of fun to be had here at Wistmead.'
'Walaric asked me to help him prepare Wistmead. It was a lot of work!'
'Have you tried finding your way through the maze?'
'How have you found Wistmead so far? Spooky, I hope!'
'I am here to help. Don't be SCARED to ask! Ha ha ha!'
'So many folk have come to Wistmead for the Harvest Festival this year.'
'It is my pleasure to help with the smooth running of the Harvest Festival!'
